DOC.criteria: Male righthanded* , healthy volunteer 18 40 year age . Having sign date informed consent form Any significant disease history clinically important drug allergy . Acute disease state within 7 day . History drug abuse within 1 year . History current excessive use alcohol / positive alcohol screen . History narrow angle glaucoma , seizures epilepsy brain injury . History Gluten sensitivity , Gluten intolerance ( celiac disease ) , Wheat allergy Wheat intolerance . History obstructive voiding symptom , include urinary retention .
